Html:
Quite a nasty bug has entered the system causing Mind Flay to not properly get hasted. This should make results fairly inaccurate. Hopefully 2.3.2 will be out soon to fix this.

 

I'll make sure whoever is responsible for this gets proper punishment. And I'll make sure whoever gets punished isn't enjoying it like last time.

 

I also want to add at the same time that people should make their T8 parts available for the Optimizer, as the T8 2 part bonus is pretty powerful with the hasted DoT changes.

Actually, bug is not as big of a deal as I thought it was, it mostly affected display only, after careful checking.

4 Piece Tier 10 does not work properly in 2.3.0/2.3.1 however. That should be fixed (and zomg!!!)
